section.heading: Consolidated health district; status of existing local boards of health

content.p:
ยง 392. Consolidated health district; status of existing local boards
of health. 1. When any consolidated health district is established, as
provided in this article, the boards of health of the towns, villages or
cities included within such district, shall thereupon cease to exist as
boards of health, and all their rights, powers, duties and obligations
shall thereupon be transferred to the board of health of such district.
 2. When the board of health of any such consolidated health district
shall have appointed a health officer therefor, the terms of office of
the health officers of the towns, villages or cities included in such
district shall cease, and all their rights, powers, duties and
obligations shall thereupon be transferred to and imposed upon the
health officer appointed for such consolidated health district.
